title: Hogwarts Legacy
text: Player: I appricate your working with me before the term begi-
Professor Fig: George. Glad my rather cryptic description of our location did not thwart your finding us.
*Fig and George shake hands in greetings*
George Osric: I've Apparated to more vaguely defined destinations than this. *chuckles*
George Osric: Though, I confess I may have miscalculated slightly on my firs try.
Gave quite the fright to some theatre-goers in the West End. *chuckles*
Professor Fig: It's been much too long. When I recieved your owl, I must say I -
George Osric: Best not speak here, Eleazar, hm?
Professor Fig: Of course. Why don't we speak en route to Hogwarts? we have a
start-of-term feast and a Sorting Ceremony to get to.
George Osric: Wonderful idea. As long as your young charge here doesn't mind me tagging along.
